document.full_text: lindsey vonn, overall world cup winner for the last three seasons, snatched the lead in this year's contest from maria riesch after the german flopped at the downhill in lenzerheide on wednesday.
document.title: vonn grabs cup lead after riesch flops
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn, overall world cup winner for the last three seasons, snatched the lead in this year's contest from maria riesch after the german flopped at the downhill in lenzerheide on wednesday.
